data.prayer: Spirit, help the 10,953 believers find a person of peace today among the 984,747 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Moga, Punjab, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Moga, Punjab, India with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Father, we ask for networks of simple churches in every city in the county of Moga, like Paul planted in Corinth and Ephesus.
data.verse: The churches in the province of Asia send you greetings. Aquila and Priscilla greet you warmly in the Lord, and so does the church that meets at their house.

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Moga. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Jat Sidhu (Hindu traditions) people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Lord, make the 10,953 believers in Moga to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 984,747 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the county of Moga to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the county of Moga, Punjab, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
